00067 class SIM_API cDensityEstBase : public cStdDev
00068 {
00069   public:
00073     enum {
00074         RANGE_INVALID,   // --> needs to be set
00075         RANGE_FIXED,     // --> fixed range (lower,upper)
00076         RANGE_AUTO,
00077         RANGE_AUTOLOWER, // --> will be determined from firstvals[],
00078         RANGE_AUTOUPPER, //        using min and/or max and range_ext_fact
00079         RANGE_NOTSET     // --> not set, but it's OK (cVarHistogram only)
00080     };
00081 
00087     struct Cell
00088     {
00089         double lower;  // lower cell bound (inclusive)
00090         double upper;  // lower cell bound (exclusive)
00091         double value;  // counter (or its estimate)
00092         double relativeFreq;  // value / total
00093         Cell() {lower=upper=value=relativeFreq=0;}
00094     };
00095 
00096   protected:
00097     double rangemin,rangemax;   // range for distribution density collection
00098     long num_firstvals;         // number of "pre-collected" samples
00099                                 // before transform() is performed.
00100     unsigned long cell_under;
00101     unsigned long cell_over;    // for counting observations that fall out of range
00102 
00103     double range_ext_factor;    // the range of histogram is: [min_samples,max_samples] made
00104                                 // range_ext_factor times larger
00105     int range_mode;             // one of RANGE_xxx constants
00106 
00107     bool transfd;
00108     double *firstvals;         // pointer to array of "pre-collected" samples
00109 
00110   protected:
00111     static void plotline (std::ostream& os, char* pref, double xval,
00112                           double count, double a);
00113 
00114   public:
00117 
00121     cDensityEstBase(const cDensityEstBase& r) : cStdDev()
00122             {setName(r.name());firstvals=NULL;operator=(r);}
00123 
00127     explicit cDensityEstBase(const char *name=NULL);
00128 
00132     virtual ~cDensityEstBase();
00133 
00137     cDensityEstBase& operator=(const cDensityEstBase& res);
00139 
00142 
00143     /* No dup() because this is an abstract class. */
00144 
00148     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00149 
00155     virtual void netPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00156 
00162     virtual void netUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00164 
00167 
00175     virtual void collect(double val);
00176 
00180     virtual void clearResult();
00181 
00185     virtual void saveToFile(FILE *) const;
00186 
00190     virtual void loadFromFile(FILE *);
00192 
00195 
00200     virtual void setRange(double lower, double upper);
00201 
00213     virtual void setRangeAuto(int num_firstvals=100, double range_ext_fact=2.0);
00214 
00222     virtual void setRangeAutoLower(double upper, int num_firstvals=100, double range_ext_fact=2.0);
00223 
00231     virtual void setRangeAutoUpper(double lower, int num_firstvals=100, double range_ext_fact=2.0);
00232 
00237     virtual void setNumFirstVals(int num_firstvals);
00239 
00240   protected:
00247     virtual void setupRange();
00248 
00255     virtual void collectTransformed(double val) = 0;
00256 
00257   public:
00258 
00261 
00265     virtual bool transformed() const   {return transfd;}
00266 
00273     virtual void transform() = 0;
00275 
00278 
00283     virtual int cells() const = 0;
00284 
00292     virtual double basepoint(int k) const = 0;
00293 
00299     virtual double cell(int k) const = 0;
00300 
00308     virtual double cellPDF(int k) const;
00309 
00314     virtual unsigned long underflowCell() const {return cell_under;}
00315 
00320     virtual unsigned long overflowCell() const {return cell_over;}
00321 
00326     virtual Cell cellInfo(int k) const;
00328 
00331 
00337     virtual double pdf(double x) const = 0;
00338 
00344     virtual double cdf(double x) const = 0;
00346 };
